Request Press Copy

Description

Cute, but challenging! Don't let the cute look or super fun animations fool you, Puzzimals has thought-provoking puzzles that challenge players with each new level. Puzzimals brings back those that lovers of puzzle and match 3 games love: creative puzzles and almost infinite combos. Players can have fun over 100 levels, combining different types of squares such as ice, wild cards, bombs and more.

History

Puzzimals, Brazilian game in the final stages of development opens registration for open beta

In development by indie gamedev Diego Giacomelli from Porto Alegre (RS), Puzzimals started the registration phase for open beta. Scheduled to launch soon, the puzzle game will initially be released for Android, but the Apple device is also in the plans.

Sign up for the open beta

Subscription link: https://t.co/BcrgqyUgwz

Features

  • +100 levels
  • Creative puzzles
  • Almost infinite combos
  • Cute animals
